itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple Windows VM with two Data Disks, created from a specialized (not syspreped) blob
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Windows VM with two Data Disks using Azure Managed Disks, created from a specialized (not syspreped) blob.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Windows VM with two Data Disks using Azure Managed Disks, created from a specialized (not syspreped) blob.
